text: function takes vector file paths returns vector modified paths prefixes /suffixes added filenames. useful generating output paths convert_files() convert_dir() functions. files_to_convert() useful generating input paths.

title: Generate modified file paths by adding prefixes and/or suffixes — output_paths
Generate modified file paths by adding prefixes and/or suffixes — output_paths
text: paths character vector file paths modify prefix character string add beginning filename. Default empty sting "". suffix character string add end filename, extension. Default "_new". dir optional character string specifying output directory. provided, modified filenames placed directory. useful paths relative different output directory required. Default NULL.

title: Generate modified file paths by adding prefixes and/or suffixes — output_paths
text: character vector modified file paths specified prefixes suffixes. original paths preserved names returned vector.

title: Generate modified file paths by adding prefixes and/or suffixes — output_paths
code: # Get all convertible files from examples directory input_files <- files_to_convert(example_dir())  # Generate output paths with "_converted" suffix output_paths(input_files, suffix = "_converted") #>             nested/penguins.qmd                 no_penguins.Rmd  #> "nested/penguins_converted.qmd"     "no_penguins_converted.Rmd"  #>                      penguins.R  #>          "penguins_converted.R"   # Add both prefix and suffix and place in a new directory output_paths(   input_files,   prefix = "base_",   suffix = "_converted",   dir = "~/new_dir" ) #>                            nested/penguins.qmd  #> "~/new_dir/nested/base_penguins_converted.qmd"  #>                                no_penguins.Rmd  #>     "~/new_dir/base_no_penguins_converted.Rmd"  #>                                     penguins.R  #>          "~/new_dir/base_penguins_converted.R"
